articles.description: Layoffs 2023: US-based employers announced that 2,70,416 people were handed over pink slips. The top reason for job cuts so far this year is market and economic conditions. Meanwhile, hiring plans fell to 9,044, the lowest total for March since 2015, when 6,4…
articles.content: The report revealed 89,703 job cuts in March, up 15 per cent from the 77,770 announced in February. It is up 319 per cent from 21,387 cuts announced in the same month in 2022. (File Photo)
